info.name: Adrian Taupe II 2 Pc. Sectional
info.fcomRCopy: Easy Living. Seeking cozy comfort in your living room, while leaving a nice cushion in your budget? Look no further than the Perry II Taupe sectional sofa! The full look offers a semi-attached cushion design, which contours to the body while retaining its shape, while flared pillowtop arms keep form and function in mind. Boasting a warm taupe color, the inviting fabric combines soft as suede® touchability with the smart performance of microfiber. Two piece sectional includes left-facing sofa and right-facing sofa, as shown.
info.details: Sectional measures 88 inches from left arm to corner and 88 inches from corner to right arm.
